name: Healthy & Delicious: Asparagus Shandong-Style
description: Asparagus season is upon us, my friends. And to celebrate its arrival—along with that of budding blossoms, torrential rain, and allergies that just won't quit—a quick, simple, crazy-healthy recipe is in order.
recipeIngredient: 2 drops chili oil (or a pinch cayenne powder)

recipeInstructions.text: Cut asparagus into 2-inch pieces on the diagonal.
Bring a pot of water to boil. Cook asparagus 1 1/2 to 2 minutes (slightly longer if very thick). Drain. Place in ice bath 3 minutes. Drain and pat asparagus dry.
In bowl, combine soy sauce, sesame oil, and chili oil (or cayenne). Add asparagus and toss to combine. Top with sesame seeds. Serve
